other_tests.findings: New regional wall motion abnormalities with inferoapical dyskinesis and anteroapical akinesis; incomplete closure of the mitral valve with apical tenting and severe mitral regurgitation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up echocardiogram after 1 month showed only mild MR with LV ejection fraction improved to 80% and normal apical wall motion.

other_tests.findings: New T-wave inversions suggestive of anteroseptal ischemia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: These changes were not present on a previous ECG done 6 months before.
